page.title: 08HEYFORD CLUBS/ORGANISATIONS
page.content: Here is a list of the clubs and organisations in Nether Heyford for both young and old. *ATHLETICS - Wed & Sun (see page 10) *BRITISH LEGION - 3rd Thursday +BROWNIES - Tuesday CRICKET - Sat & Sun, always away +CUBS - Thursday *DARBY & JOAN - Alt Wed FOOTBALL - Sat, Sun & Wed +GUIDES - Monday GUN - Saturday & Sunday *MONDAY CLUB - Alt Mon (see page 9) *MUMS & TODDLERS - Wednesday +SCOUTS - Tuesday *WOMEN'S INSTITUTE - 1st Thursday +W.E.A. - Wed (Sept to April) YOUTH CLUB - Tuesday & Thursday Clubs marked * meet in the Village Hall Clubs marked + meet in the School The cricket club plays away as it is not allowed to use the Village Green.
